description:
Secure, Fast & Private Web Browser with Adblocker

The new Brave browser blocks ads and trackers that slow you down and invade your privacy.
Discover a new way of thinking about how the web can work.
Web3
- Added support for resolving new UD TLDs. (#40543)
- Updated placement of deposit address in the wallet panel for "Deposit" screen. (#40826)
- Updated Brave Wallet background with gradient color. (#40948)
General
- Added support for local vector search for the selection of key text segments of page and video context while using Brave Leo. (#36801)
- Added search query and summary from Brave Search SERP when available while using Brave Leo. (#40615)
- Added advanced server selection to Brave VPN. (#38186)
- Added Italy content feed support for Brave News. (#40957)
- Added support for Chromium's tri-color profile schemes. (#40689)
- Added a native menu and inject for the adblock content picker. (#40821)
- Updated the source within the URL for search suggestions. (#41112)
- Moved the "Inactive tabs appearance" setting to brave://settings/appearance. (#41482)
- Moved "Copy clean link" to be listed first in the share menu. (#40614)
- Removed known tracking parameter "srsltid" from URLs. (#40912)
- Removed known tracking parameter "_bhlid" from URLs. (#40716)
- Removed caption options from the media control popup. (#41527)
- Fixed crash which occurred when visiting brave://branded-wallpaper or brave://background-wallpaper. (#40807)
- Fixed crash which occurred when pinning a tab that is part of a tab group while using vertical tabs. (#40365)
- Fixed scriptlets not working in about:blank frames. (#40703)
- Fixed styling not being applied for "Filter lists" and "Add custom filter lists" under brave://settings/shields/filters. (#27647)
- Upgraded Chromium to 130.0.6723.58. (#41651) (Changelog for 130.0.6723.58)
